rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Kitting Opportunity - Lightning", ISCHANGED( Instructions_for_Implementation_Team__c ))

rules.description: Lightning - Update the Rank to Cold for Stages 1 and 2

criteriaItems.value: 4- Propose,5- Implement,6-Closing Presentation to Decision Maker,7- Verbal Commitment

rules.description: Lightning - Update Rank to Hot for Stages 4 and 5

criteriaItems.value: 3- Develop Solution,3- Project Identified,4- Demo/RFQ,5- Proposal

rules.description: Lightning - Update Rank to Warm for Stage 3

criteriaItems.value: 6- Closed Won,0- Closed Lost,8- Closed Won

rules.description: Lightning - Update Rank to Null for Closed Won and Closed Lost
Lightning - mark a flag on the opportunity whenever a closed Opportunity is reopened. This flag is used in other workflows, to exclude reopened opportunities from notifications.
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED(StageName), OR ( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName) , "6- Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName) , "8- Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName) , "0- Closed Lost") ) )

rules.fullName: Notify on change of ETA on Doc
rules.description: Vine Opportunities - notify if ETA on Document in Progress value changes
When an Opportunity is converted to PDN, send the user an email with attachments of forms that they need to update and attach to opportunity before submitting to the PDN team
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED ( RecordTypeId ), Express_Lane__c = False, OR(RecordTypeId = "01239000000QUb2", RecordTypeId = "01270000000E0Td") )

rules.description: Applies when a local account associated with a national account has an opportunity created against it

rules.fullName: Pass Opp Bill to Number to Prospect
rules.description: When a prospect opportunity is updated, pass the bill to number to the account bill to number to merge with.

rules.fullName: Pass Prospect Billto to Merge With to Opp
rules.description: If an opportunity is created against a Prospect, pass the Billto Number To Merge With into the opportunity Bill To Number field

rules.fullName: Update Last Upd Date Non Sysadmin
rules.description: Update the Last Update Date by Non-System Admins
rules.formula: and ($Profile.Name <> "Analytics Cloud Integration User", $Profile.Name <> "Analytics Cloud Security User", $Profile.Name <> "Genesis Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Marketo Sync", $Profile.Name <> "Premier Support User", $Profile.Name <> "Sales Insights Integration User", $Profile.Name <> "SalesforceIQ Integration User", $Profile.Name <> "SmartSync Mobile Profile", $Profile.Name <> "SmartSync Profile", $Profile.Name <> "System Admin - API", $Profile.Name <> "API admin", $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator")

rules.fullName: Update PSR Email Fields - On Change
rules.description: Update all PSR Email fields if the PSR on the Opportunity changed

rules.fullName: Update PSR Email Fields - On Create
rules.description: Update all PSR Email fields on Create if the PSR is identified on the Opportunity

tasks.description: This opportunity has a close date that is more than 60 days past due. Please update the close date and other opportunity information immediately to ensure that it is not marked Lost with a reason of "Expired opportunity."
